THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

=
op
2020/KER/839
Crl.MC 8915/2019
-3-
ORDER
Dated this the 8th day of January 2020

Petitioners are accused 1 to 7 in SC No.155/2019
on the files of the IIIrd Additional Sessions Court,
Palakkad for having allegedly committed offences
punishable under Sections 364(A), 394, 395 and
506Cii) IPC.

2. The defacto complainant and the aggrieved

are respondents 2 and 3. They have appeared through
counsel and filed affidavits to the effect that the
matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners
and that they do not have any grievance against them.
A report to that effect has also been obtained from
the investigating officer through the learned Senior
Public Prosecutor. The petitioners do not have any
criminal antecedents. No public interest 15s
involved.

In the result, the Criminal M.C. is allowed and
the entire proceedings as against the petitioners
herein in SC No.155/2019 on the files of the ItIIrd

Biipias el
ie 5 ie
2020/KER/839
Crl.MC 8915/2019
-4-
Additional Sessions Court, Palakkad shall stand
quashed
